Comments_List: yes, I learned a lot from my colleagues' dissertation work!

This course is such an integral course to our learning.  Both to have the opportunity to present our own ideas and receive feedback, and to listen to where other students are on their own projects is great and moved my thinking further along than I could have imagined at the beginning of the year.

I think that written feedback from the other PhD students would be helpful. Something like a short survey used at professional conferences. It would also help document their feedback for continued thought.
Great professional discussions with peers and colleagues

Having the opportunity to give and hear presentations from fellow students was such an enriching experience.  They way the course is set up is great, and the feedback is really helpful in developing ideas.  I think having our advisors there this year for the presentations was also particularly helpful and enriching.
yes, this is a must for all PhD students
